turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my phone but something urgent has happened and I really need your help. It's about Uncle Tom at homeHe needs some quick cash for something important and I'm the only one who could talk to you right now since Mom and Dad are away. Can you please tell me what's going on Grandpa? Are you there?

Oh, hello dear! My hearing isn't as sharp as it used to beWho is this speaking? And which Uncle Tom are we talking about exactly? I don't want to make a mistake with something important. Can you speak clearer, please?

It's your grandson here, Grandpa! The one who lives out of town. And it's about Uncle Thomas Mitchell from the IRS office downtown. He's trying to help us resolve an issue but needs some immediate assistance from you regarding a payment due today or there could be serious trouble. Can you please tell me more about this so I can pass on the right information?

Oh my, that does sound serious, doesn't it? Let me see if I can find out what's going on here. Hold on just a moment while I look around for any paperwork or notes about Uncle Thomas. Yes, he did come over last week with some papers to sign but they were all in order as far as I could tell then. What kind of payment is this about exactly? Can you explain more?

Absolutely, Grandpa. Uncle Thomas mentioned it's an urgent payment regarding unpaid taxes from a few years back that needs to be settled today to avoid any legal action. The amount isn't too large but needs to be handled quickly through gift cards as a secure method of payment. Could you perhaps check if there are enough funds available somewhere safe at home? Let me know what you find out so we can proceed right away, okay?

Oh dear, that does sound quite serious. I'll have to look around and see if we've set aside any money for such emergencies. My wife is here too; she might remember more details from when Uncle Thomas last visited about these matters. Let me ask her and get back to you soon, alright?

That sounds like a good idea, Grandpa. Please take your time but try to hurry up if possible since the deadline is very strict today. I'll be waiting for your call once you find out more. Is there any chance you could use some of those gift cards we got for birthdays or holidays? They would work perfectly for this situation. Let me know as soon as you can, okay?

Alright dear, I understand the urgency. I will check with my wife and see if she remembers anything about these matters. We have a few gift cards but they were meant for specific purposes. Still, we'll need to look into this further. I'll call you back shortly once we've had a chance to discuss it.

Thank you so much, Grandpa. Please do hurry as best you can since the IRS has strict deadlines and missing today could lead to serious consequences for both of us. We really appreciate your help with this matter. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
I understand, dear. I'll do my very best to sort this out quickly. Talk to you soon then.
Thanks again, Grandpa. Take care and let's solve this as soon as possible. Bye for now.
